languages.text: {n}Пожилой мужчина перед вами двигается с бесшумностью опытного слуги. Чопорно поклонившись, он хриплым голосом произносит:{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор велел передать, что будет рад видеть Вашу Светлость во дворце. Он желает побеседовать о делах особой срочности и важности и надеется, что вы сможете уделить ему время в ближайшее время".

{n}The elderly man in front of you is moving with the noiselessness of an experienced servant. He bows primly and says, in a raspy voice,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor bade me inform you that it will be his pleasure to see Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship at his palace. There are matters of the utmost urgency that he wishes to discuss, and he hopes you will find the time to meet with him in the near future."
languages.original_text: {n}Пожилой мужчина перед вами двигается с бесшумностью опытного слуги. Чопорно поклонившись, он хриплым голосом произносит:{/n} "Лорд-инквизитор велел передать, что будет рад видеть Вашу Светлость во дворце. Он желает побеседовать о делах особой срочности и важности и надеется, что вы сможете уделить ему время в ближайшее время".

languages.text: {n}你眼前的老人带着老练仆人的举止，悄无声息地走到你面前。他彬彬有礼地向你鞠了一躬，随后以沙哑的声音开了口。{/n}“是大审判官大人派我来的。他让我转告您，他很希望能在他的宫殿里见您一面，大人。他有要事相商，希望您能在近期抽出时间见他一面。”
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly man in front of you is moving with the noiselessness of an experienced servant. He bows primly and says, in a raspy voice,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor bade me inform you that it will be his pleasure to see Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship at his palace. There are matters of the utmost urgency that he wishes to discuss, and he hopes you will find the time to meet with him in the near future."

traits.locale_text: {n}你眼前的老人以老练仆人的动作，悄无声息地走到你面前。他彬彬有礼地向你鞠了一躬，随后以沙哑的声音开了口。{/n}“是审判长大人派我来的。他让我转告您，他很希望能在他的宫殿里见您一面，大人。他有要是相商，希望您能在近期抽出时间见他一面。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}目の前にいる老人は、さながら経験豊かな召使ように騒々しさの一切ない動きをしていた。彼は初々しく頭を下げると、しゃがれた声で喋った。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターは、城で陛下にお会いできることを楽しみにしています。この事をあなたに伝えるようにと、伝言を預かっております。特に緊急の案件に関してお話したいようで、近い内にお会いに来ることを期待されておいでです」
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly man in front of you is moving with the noiselessness of an experienced servant. He bows primly and says, in a raspy voice,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor bade me inform you that it will be his pleasure to see Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship at his palace. There are matters of the utmost urgency that he wishes to discuss, and he hopes you will find the time to meet with him in the near future."

traits.locale_text: {n}目の前にいる老人は、さながら経験豊かな召使ように騒々しさの一切ない動きをしていた。彼は初々しく頭を下げると、しゃがれた声で喋った。{/n}「ロード・インクィジターは、城で陛下にお会いできることを楽しみにしています。この事をあなたに伝えるようにと、伝言を預かっております。特に緊急の案件に関してお話したいようで、近い内にお会いに来ることを期待されておいでです」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}El anciano que tienes delante se mueve con el desparpajo de un criado experimentado. Se inclina ante ti y dice, con voz ronca:{/n} «El Lord Inquisidor me ha solicitado que le haga saber que será un placer recibir a mi{mf|lord|lady} en su palacio. Hay asuntos de máxima urgencia que desea discutir y espera que encuentre tiempo para reunirse con él en un futuro próximo».
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly man in front of you is moving with the noiselessness of an experienced servant. He bows primly and says, in a raspy voice,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor bade me inform you that it will be his pleasure to see Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship at his palace. There are matters of the utmost urgency that he wishes to discuss, and he hopes you will find the time to meet with him in the near future."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano que tienes delante se mueve con el desparpajo de un criado experimentado. Se inclina ante ti y dice, con voz ronca:{/n} «El Lord Inquisidor me ha dicho que os haga saber que será un placer recibir a mi{mf|lord|lady} en su palacio. Hay asuntos de máxima urgencia que desea discutir y espera que encuentre tiempo para reunirse con él en un futuro próximo».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann vor dir bewegt sich mit der Geräuschlosigkeit eines erfahrenen Dieners. Er verneigt sich förmlich und sagt mit krächzender Stimme:{/n} "Der Großinquisitor lässt ausrichten, dass es ihm ein Vergnügen sein wird, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft in seinem Palast zu empfangen. Er wünscht Angelegenheiten von größter Dringlichkeit zu besprechen, und er hofft, Ihr werdet in naher Zukunft die Zeit finden, ihn aufzusuchen."
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly man in front of you is moving with the noiselessness of an experienced servant. He bows primly and says, in a raspy voice,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor bade me inform you that it will be his pleasure to see Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship at his palace. There are matters of the utmost urgency that he wishes to discuss, and he hopes you will find the time to meet with him in the near future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann vor dir bewegt sich mit der Geräuschlosigkeit eines erfahrenen Dieners. Er verneigt sich förmlich und sagt mit krächzender Stimme:{/n} "Der Großinquisitor lässt ausrichten, dass es ihm ein Vergnügen sein wird, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft in seinem Palast zu empfangen. Er wünscht Angelegenheiten von größter Dringlichkeit zu besprechen, und er hofft, Ihr werdet in naher Zukunft die Zeit finden, ihn aufzusuchen."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}L'homme âgé qui se tient devant vous se déplace sans faire le moindre bruit, comme attendu de la part de tout serviteur digne de ce nom. Il s'incline avant d'énoncer d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a chargé de vous faire savoir qu'il sera ravi de recevoir Votre Seigneurie dans son palais. Il souhaite discuter avec vous d'affaires de la plus haute importance et espère que vous trouverez le temps de le rencontrer dans les plus brefs délais. »
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly man in front of you is moving with the noiselessness of an experienced servant. He bows primly and says, in a raspy voice,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor bade me inform you that it will be his pleasure to see Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship at his palace. There are matters of the utmost urgency that he wishes to discuss, and he hopes you will find the time to meet with him in the near future."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme âgé qui se tient devant vous se déplace sans faire le moindre bruit, comme attendu de la part de tout serviteur digne de ce nom. Il s'incline avant d'énoncer d'une voix rauque :{/n} « Le seigneur inquisiteur m'a chargé de vous faire savoir qu'il sera ravi de recevoir Votre Seigneurie dans son palais. Il souhaite discuter avec vous d'affaires de la plus haute importance et espère que vous trouverez le temps de le rencontrer dans les plus brefs délais. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche

languages.text: {n}Önündeki yaşlı adam, hiç ses çıkarmadan hareket ediyor. Deneyimli bir hizmetkâr olduğu belli. Önünde eğilip kulak tırmalayıcı bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni sarayında ağırlamaktan mutluluk duyacağını iletmemi istedi. Sizinle konuşmak istediği, epey aciliyeti olan bazı konular varmış. Yakın gelecekte onunla görüşmeye zaman ayırmanızı umuyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The elderly man in front of you is moving with the noiselessness of an experienced servant. He bows primly and says, in a raspy voice,{/n} "The Lord Inquisitor bade me inform you that it will be his pleasure to see Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship at his palace. There are matters of the utmost urgency that he wishes to discuss, and he hopes you will find the time to meet with him in the near future."

traits.locale_text: {n}Önündeki yaşlı adam hiç ses çıkarmadan hareket ediyor. Deneyimli bir hizmetkâr olduğu belli. Önünde eğiliyor ve kulak tırmalayıcı bir sesle konuşuyor:{/n} "Lord Engizisyoncu, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ni sarayında ağırlamaktan mutluluk duyacağını iletmemi istedi. Sizinle konuşmak istediği, büyük aciliyeti olan bazı konular var ve yakın gelecekte onunla görüşmek için zaman ayırmanızı umuyor."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Frosche
